column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Bring your headphones for the audio tour! I remember them giving us a listening device on my previous visit
column2: but now the audio tour is only available via their app
column3: and you need your own headphones. They're doing okay with COVID precautions. Masks are required
column5: and they remind you to social distance
column6: but that is not possible in the special exhibit due to the amount of people in that space.
